alert.note: Alert for Clatsop; Tillamook (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued November 04 at 11:00PM PDT until November 05 at 12:38PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Oregon and Washington... Trask River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Nehalem River near Foss affecting Tillamook and Clatsop Counties. Wilson River near Tillamook affecting Tillamook County. Grays River near Rosburg affecting Wahkiakum County. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Washington... Naselle River near Naselle affecting Wahkiakum and Pacific Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nehalem River near Foss. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 15.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low lying farm land and structures. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM PDT Friday the stage was 14.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 15.2 feet around 5 am Saturday. It will then fall below flood stage later Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning by 10 am PDT.
